DOC.brief_summary: The aim long-term study investigate effect roflumilast ( APTA-2217 ) long-term safety patient asthma , complete 24-week evaluation study APTA-2217-05 . Roflumilast administer orally daily . The present study consist 28 week treatment period , extension 24-week study APTA-2217-05 ( register study ) . The study provide long-term safety efficacy data roflumilast .
